        public void addStation​(Station s)

        s - - the station Add the station to the list and name to the array. O(n)

      • addRider

        public void addRider​(Rider r)
        Parameters:
        r - - new rider object This method (i) sets a Riderâ€™s direction based on the order of the Stations in the Railway and (ii) adds the Rider to the appropriate Station in the Railway O(n)

      • addTrain

        public void addTrain​(Train t)
        Parameters:
        t - - the new train This method adds a Train to the appropriate Station in this Railway. O(n)

      • setRiderDirection

        public void setRiderDirection​(Rider r)
        Parameters:
        r - - the rider object This method set the correct moving direction of the rider based on their starting and destination. O(n)

      • simulate

        public java.lang.String simulate()
        Returns:
        - the running log of the train This method will execute one simulation of the Railway. You should log the events that occur in the process of your simulation such as the status of each Station, where Trains and Riders are, and when Riders exit a Train. O(n^2) - addTrain is O(n)
